sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A christian familiar comfort and incouragement vnto all English subiects, not to dismaie at the Spanish threats Whereunto is added an admonition to all English Papists, who openly or couertly couet a change. With requisite praiers to almightie God for the preseruation of our queene and countrie. By the most vnworthie I.N. Christian familiar comfort and incouragement unto all English subjects, not to dismaie at the Spanish threats. Norden, John, 1548-1625?
[6], 70 p.
[By T. Scarlet and J. Orwin] for J. B[rome], Printed at London : 1596.
Dedication signed: Iohn Norden. Printers' and publisher's names from STC. First three quires printed by Scarlet; the rest by J. Orwin. Pages 20, 24, 62 and 63 misnumbered 24, 20, 63 and 62. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
A christian familiar comfort and incouragement vnto all English subiects, not to dismaie at the Spanish threats Whereunto is added an admonition to all English Papists, who openly or couertly couet a change. With requisite praiers to almightie God for the preseruation of our queene and countrie. By the most vnworthie I.N. Christian familiar comfort and incouragement unto all English subjects, not to dismaie at the Spanish threats. Norden, John, 1548-1625?
[6], 70 p.
[By T. Scarlet and J. Orwin] for J. B[rome], Printed at London : 1596.
Dedication signed: Iohn Norden. Printers' and publisher's names from STC. First three quires printed by Scarlet; the rest by J. Orwin. Pages 20, 24, 62 and 63 misnumbered 24, 20, 63 and 62. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
J. B[rome]
J. Orwin]
T. Scarlet
